评论详情: I’ve purchased three pairs of these sunglasses, and I’m happy to report that none of them have broken. The first two pairs came with a soft drawstring case, but the third one didn’t include one, which was a bit disappointing.  The first pair I bought had mirrored lenses, which unfortunately scratched pretty easily over time. However, I switched to the brown gradient lenses for my subsequent pairs, and I’m happy to say they’ve been much more durable and haven’t scratched at all.  What I really love about these sunglasses, though, is how comfortable they are on my face. They fit perfectly and are lightweight, making them ideal for long wear. I’m definitely a fan and would recommend them to anyone looking for stylish, affordable, and functional sunglasses!

类型: Color: Night Vision Lens / Clear Frame
评论详情: I got to test the night driving glasses out tonight and while I was driving I thought to myself “I need to give these a review!”. First, I am very sensitive to bright lights, especially blue lights. Where I live, the roads are dark and narrow and deer are everywhere so people tend to put their brights on and either forget they are supposed to turn them off for oncoming cars or they just don’t care. There are also a lot of trucks that have insanely bright lights that can cause me actual pain. That being said, I had low expectations for these glasses, because I didn’t think it could be such a simple solution. I googled “what do people do about bright lights at night while driving?” Several pairs of glasses were suggested. I came here and picked these because of the price. I am so glad that I have these. Tonight I didn’t hate everyone! I didn’t swear one single time! The bright lights are neutralized just enough and the blue lights are a light green hue. My eyes were happy. I drive at night a few times a week so this was much needed. It actually works. It works and they are pretty cute. The frames are light weight. This was a good buy.
